attributes.action: HAVE ALL ELECTRICAL RETAILERS SWITCH OFF ELECTRICAL PRODUCTS WHILST ON DISPLAY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last year I have been to most large electrical retail outlets where tv's & pc's are left fully switched on all day. My petition is simple 
Do customers only want to purchase electrical goods that have been displayed in this way all day long?
    or 
do customers prefer to help save our planet & have electrical retailers turn on, turn off !"
